title: >>> One YEAR in the Making
body_text:
It all started one year ago ...
"It was a night where Chris Adams and company defeated John and company with a final score of 6 to 3."
- DODGEBALL 9 results here on dodgeball.livejournal.com/ (October 23rd, 2005)
It's a rivalry since the beginning of time, pitting two of the most violent and respected veterans against each other for a one-night, or in this case a second showdown.
The 9th edition of dodgeball was no laughing matter for one John Tronolone as he walked off the court that night a defeated man. He had lost his first captains battle, a certain prelude of things to come in his storied career. For Chris however, he has rolled since that first match, having defeated some of the game's best, including his brother Steve. Although his record is a solid 3 and 1, that one loss was the colossal team battle at DODGEBALL 50. Chris has yet to be beaten in singles competition.
Will John be the one to finally defeat his nemesis?
Will Chris remain on top of the dodgeball world?
Catch DODGEBALL LIX October 14th to find out!
________________________________
DODGEBALL LIX Award
Around this time in the dodgeball world, "ten" event awards are being created. However, one in particular will be given out a little early. If you are attending DODGEBALL LIX, then witness history unfold right before your very eyes with the first non-"ten" event award! Not even the recipient knows!
Witness
Round 2
, the first non-"ten" event award, and so much more at the 59th dodgeball extravanganza!
